table.name: vtiger_sqlreports
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_sqlreports` ( `sqlreportsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `reportnum` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `reportname` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL, `reportsql` text ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_sqlreportscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_sqlreportscf` ( `sqlreportsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sqlreportsid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_sqlreportsgrouprel
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_sqlreportsgrouprel` ( `sqlreportsid` int(11) NOT NULL, `groupname` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sqlreportsid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
